body:
Yes, the problem is there is no syntax for named return types, and NN autogen relies on the return name. Not terribly motivated to fix this if we're axing NN autogen though.

Also, yes I'll delete the return in `func`.
body_html:
Yes, the problem is there is no syntax for named return types, and NN autogen relies on the return name. Not terribly motivated to fix this if we're axing NN autogen though.

Also, yes I'll delete the return in func.
body_text:
Yes, the problem is there is no syntax for named return types, and NN autogen relies on the return name. Not terribly motivated to fix this if we're axing NN autogen though.
Also, yes I'll delete the return in func.
